figures.name: Bob Marley
figures.description: Reggae legend. Truth-teller, unity builder, peace-oriented. Used music to spread messages of love, unity, and liberation.
key_actions: Music as tool for truth and unity
quotes: One love, one heart, let's get together and feel all right.
Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our minds.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through music, truth, unity, love, and peace. One of the greatest anchors in music.

metadata.notable: Global icon for peace and unity

figures.name: John Lennon
figures.description: Beatles member, solo artist. Peace activist, truth-teller. Used music to spread messages of peace and love.
quotes: Give peace a chance.
All you need is love.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through music, peace, and love.

figures.name: Muhammad Ali
figures.description: Boxing legend. Truth-teller, authentic, empowering. Used platform to speak truth, resist oppression, and inspire unity.
quotes: I am the greatest.
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth, authenticity, empowerment, and unity. One of the greatest anchors in sports.

figures.name: Colin Kaepernick
figures.description: Former NFL quarterback. Truth-teller, authentic. Used platform to speak truth about racial injustice. Kneeled for justice.
quotes: I am not going to stand up to show pride in a flag for a country that oppresses black people and people of color.
There's nothing wrong with standing up for what you believe in.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, authenticity, and speaking truth to power. Current anchor in sports.

figures.name: Emma Watson
figures.description: Actress, UN Women Goodwill Ambassador. Truth-teller, community-focused, ethical. Uses platform for gender equality and environmental stewardship.
quotes: Both men and women should feel free to be sensitive. Both men and women should feel free to be strong.
I don't want other people to decide who I am. I want to decide that for myself.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, gender equality, environmental stewardship, and ethical action.

figures.name: MrBeast (Jimmy Donaldson)
figures.description: YouTube creator. Uses massive platform for community good - planting trees, feeding people, giving away money. Hidden alignment through action.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through community-focused action, stewardship, and using platform for good. Hidden alignment.

figures.name: Greta Thunberg
figures.description: Climate activist. Truth-teller, authentic, empowering. Uses platform to speak truth about climate crisis and inspire action.
quotes: Our house is on fire.
You have stolen my dreams and my childhood with your empty words.
I want you to act as if the house is on fire, because it is.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, environmental stewardship, and empowering youth. Current anchor in activism.

figures.name: Trevor Noah
figures.description: Comedian, former Daily Show host. Truth-teller, unity builder. Uses comedy to speak truth, build unity, and break down barriers.
quotes: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
We tell people to follow their dreams, but you can only dream of what you can imagine.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, unity building, and using comedy to break down barriers.

figures.name: Tim Berners-Lee
figures.description: Inventor of the World Wide Web. Stewardship, transparent, accessible. Created open, accessible web for all.
quotes: The web is for everyone.
The web is more a social creation than a technical one.

metadata.notable: Inventor of the World Wide Web

The media can be the greatest force for peace on earth, or the greatest weapon of war.
figures.connection_to_table: Serves The Table through truth-telling, independent journalism, and giving voice to the voiceless.

For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.

figures.name: Maya Angelou

Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.

quotes: The highest form of human intelligence is to observe yourself without judgment.

Freedom is not a reaction; freedom is not a choice. Freedom is found in the choiceless awareness of our daily existence and activity.

figures.name: Dalai Lama

If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
